sentences.cn: 仓促安排的记者招待会

sentences.en: Chairs were hastily placed in rows for the parents.
sentences.cn: 椅子匆忙摆成了几排，等着家长们到来。

sentences.en: Christina blushed and hastily lowered her eyes.
sentences.cn: 克里斯蒂娜脸一红,匆忙垂下了眼睛.

sentences.en: Geoff hastily pushed the drawer back into place.
sentences.cn: 杰夫匆忙把抽屉推回去。

sentences.en: He retreated hastily back to his car.
sentences.cn: 他匆忙退回自己的车里.

sentences.en: I hastily packed the hamper and lugged it to the car.
sentences.cn: 我匆忙装好食品篮，吃力地把它拎上车子。

sentences.en: I query very much whether it is wise to act so hastily.
sentences.cn: 我真怀疑如此操之过急地行动是否明智.

sentences.en: Nothing must be done hastily but killing of fleas.
sentences.cn: 除非要捉跳蚤,做事不可匆忙.

sentences.en: Parliament was hastily recalled from recess.
sentences.cn: 休会的议员被匆匆召回开会.

sentences.en: Perhaps you shouldn't brush the idea aside too hastily.
sentences.cn: 也许你不应该太仓促地否定这个想法。

sentences.en: She had married hastily, and as hastily, grown weary of her choice.
sentences.cn: 她急忙地结了婚并且同样草率地厌倦了自己的选择.

sentences.en: She wrote it hastily and messily on a scrap of paper.
sentences.cn: 她在一张纸片上匆忙而潦草地写了下来。

sentences.en: The defeated army had to retreat hastily from the field of battle.
sentences.cn: 败军被迫仓皇地从战场上撤退.

sentences.en: The survivors were recovering in hastily erected tents.
sentences.cn: 幸存者们正在仓促搭起的帐篷里逐渐康复。

words.tran_cn: 轻率的；匆忙的；草率的；性怠的

trans.tran_cn: 匆忙地，仓促地，匆猝，草草，率尔
